New Records: Ireland's highest T20I score against South Africa with 195-6
Ireland's second-biggest T20I partnership with a 137-run stand for the first wicket
Ross Adair became the third Irish men's player to hit a T20I century
Key Match Events: Ross Adair scored his maiden international hundred with 100 runs off 58 deliveries
Mark Adair took 4 wickets for 31 runs
Graham Hume removed Ryan Rickelton for 36
Reeza Hendricks scored a half century before being dismissed by Ben White
Matthew Humphreys bowled South Africa captain Aiden Markram
Mark Adair and Neil Rock accounted for Tristan Stubbs
Matthew Breetzke scored 51 before being dismissed by Mark Adair
Graham Hume took 3 wickets for 25 runs
Miscellaneous Highlights: The victory tied the two-match T20I series
The match took place at Zayed Cricket Stadium in Abu Dhabi
